page.name: Module Structure
page.content:
This module is structured into seven sections. 

  1. Introduction
  2. Challenge
  3. New Learning
  4. Wrap-Up
  5. Try It Yourself
  6. Assessment
  7. Course Completion

You'll find Key Ideas, Pro Tips, Try it Yourself, and Resources linked throughout the text. All linked materials are gathered, along with References, in Section 4. This way, you can choose to learn more in the moment, or wait until you've completed the core content.  

Goal setting is  incredibly important, especially for Adult Education (AE), learners who come into the classroom with a range of backgrounds, skills, and educational experiences. Regardless of their motivations, however, adults who can set clear goals such as, “help my children” or “get a better job” are more likely to persist in AE programs (Digital Promise, n.d.). Once you finish this module, you will feel better equipped to develop and teach a wide range of learners to create and monitor meaningful, obtainable goals. 


Additional Resource: Learn more about our inspiration, How People Learn Framework and the STAR Legacy Model
